parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Orientation
parameter.description: Controls the on/off orientation of the rocker switch

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Remote dim level increment
parameter.description: Number of dim levels to change for each dim step when remotely commanded

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Remote dim step duration
parameter.description: Interval between dimming steps when remotely commanded

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Dim Level Increment
parameter.description: Indicates the number of levels (1-99) to change dimming each step

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Step Duration
parameter.description: The number of tens of milliseconds (1-255) to delay on each dimming step.
